ratings.question_text: What is your overall assessment of this course?

narratives.question_text: How would you summarize AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 for a fellow student? Would you recommend AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 to another student? Why or why not?
comments: This course was informative. The practical exercises and application of policy were extremely helpful in my own personal education. I have gained a deeper understanding of policy and governance because of this class.
Yes -- if you are specifically interested in Africa and thinking through innovative policy designs to address governance issues on the continent.
An overview course on the governance challenges faced in various African countries and contexts and how policy makers address them successfully and unsuccessfully.

narratives.question_text: How did this course deepen your knowledge of your discipline/profession? To what extent did this course contribute to your dissertation/research?
comments: The final practicality of the final project was great. It gave the opportunity to implement and explore the topics from the semesters' readings.
